_header: Wray thy self as a thief doth
Subjects: penance; sermons, verse in; Doomsday; death, approach of
_description: On Penance, in a Latin sermon warning about the last days — six lines in couplets

CULIi38.Transcription:
Werey þy self als a þef doȝ Say þou sotȝ
                    & noȝynge oȝer Wyith wil þy sennes tellen and leten
                    neure after þerin to slepen schewen þi sennes holliche to
                    hauen forȝifnesse trist stedefasliche
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 80.
